variables.name: TITLE_KEY
variables.comment:
* A non human readable key calculated from the TITLE, used for
             * searching, sorting and grouping
             *
             * @see Audio#keyFor(String)
             * @deprecated These keys are generated using
             *             {@link java.util.Locale#ROOT}, which means they don't
             *             reflect locale-specific sorting preferences. To apply
             *             locale-specific sorting preferences, use
             *             {@link ContentResolver#QUERY_ARG_SQL_SORT_ORDER} with
             *             {@code COLLATE LOCALIZED}, or
             *             {@link ContentResolver#QUERY_ARG_SORT_LOCALE}.

variables.name: DURATION
variables.comment: @removed promoted to parent interface

variables.name: BOOKMARK
variables.comment:
* The position within the audio item at which playback should be
             * resumed.

variables.name: ARTIST_ID
variables.comment: * The id of the artist who created the audio file, if any

variables.name: ARTIST
variables.comment: @removed promoted to parent interface

variables.name: ALBUM_ARTIST
variables.comment:
* The artist credited for the album that contains the audio file
             * @hide

variables.name: ARTIST_KEY
variables.comment:
* A non human readable key calculated from the ARTIST, used for
             * searching, sorting and grouping
             *
             * @see Audio#keyFor(String)
             * @deprecated These keys are generated using
             *             {@link java.util.Locale#ROOT}, which means they don't
             *             reflect locale-specific sorting preferences. To apply
             *             locale-specific sorting preferences, use
             *             {@link ContentResolver#QUERY_ARG_SQL_SORT_ORDER} with
             *             {@code COLLATE LOCALIZED}, or
             *             {@link ContentResolver#QUERY_ARG_SORT_LOCALE}.

variables.name: COMPOSER
variables.comment: @removed promoted to parent interface

variables.name: ALBUM_ID
variables.comment: * The id of the album the audio file is from, if any

variables.name: ALBUM
variables.comment: @removed promoted to parent interface

variables.name: ALBUM_KEY
variables.comment:
* A non human readable key calculated from the ALBUM, used for
             * searching, sorting and grouping
             *
             * @see Audio#keyFor(String)
             * @deprecated These keys are generated using
             *             {@link java.util.Locale#ROOT}, which means they don't
             *             reflect locale-specific sorting preferences. To apply
             *             locale-specific sorting preferences, use
             *             {@link ContentResolver#QUERY_ARG_SQL_SORT_ORDER} with
             *             {@code COLLATE LOCALIZED}, or
             *             {@link ContentResolver#QUERY_ARG_SORT_LOCALE}.

variables.name: TRACK
variables.comment:
* The track number of this song on the album, if any.
             * This number encodes both the track number and the
             * disc number. For multi-disc sets, this number will
             * be 1xxx for tracks on the first disc, 2xxx for tracks
             * on the second disc, etc.

variables.name: YEAR
variables.comment: * The year the audio file was recorded, if any

variables.name: IS_MUSIC
variables.comment: * Non-zero if the audio file is music

variables.name: IS_PODCAST
variables.comment: * Non-zero if the audio file is a podcast

variables.name: IS_RINGTONE
variables.comment: * Non-zero if the audio file may be a ringtone

variables.name: IS_ALARM
variables.comment: * Non-zero if the audio file may be an alarm

variables.name: IS_NOTIFICATION
variables.comment: * Non-zero if the audio file may be a notification sound

variables.name: IS_AUDIOBOOK
variables.comment: * Non-zero if the audio file is an audiobook

variables.name: IS_RECORDING
variables.comment:
* Non-zero if the audio file is a voice recording recorded
             * by voice recorder apps

variables.name: GENRE_ID
variables.comment: * The id of the genre the audio file is from, if any

variables.name: GENRE
variables.comment: * The genre of the audio file, if any.

variables.name: GENRE_KEY
variables.comment:
* A non human readable key calculated from the GENRE, used for
             * searching, sorting and grouping
             *
             * @see Audio#keyFor(String)
             * @deprecated These keys are generated using
             *             {@link java.util.Locale#ROOT}, which means they don't
             *             reflect locale-specific sorting preferences. To apply
             *             locale-specific sorting preferences, use
             *             {@link ContentResolver#QUERY_ARG_SQL_SORT_ORDER} with
             *             {@code COLLATE LOCALIZED}, or
             *             {@link ContentResolver#QUERY_ARG_SORT_LOCALE}.

variables.name: TITLE_RESOURCE_URI
variables.comment:
* The resource URI of a localized title, if any. *

* Conforms to this pattern: *

    *
  • Scheme: {@link ContentResolver#SCHEME_ANDROID_RESOURCE} *
  • Authority: Package Name of ringtone title provider *
  • First Path Segment: Type of resource (must be "string") *
  • Second Path Segment: Resource ID of title *
